file_content.text:
SECTION X TACTICAL DISPATCH / IMMEDIATE ACTION REQUIRED
The goal of the Dread Masters' forces on Belsavis has been discovered: an ancient Rakata weapon known as the "Aurora Cannon."
This single device is capable of eliminating all Imperial forces on Belsavis in a single strike. It must be disabled before the Dread Masters' minions can capture it.
Once the cannon is located, it should be immediately disabled via electromagnetic pulse munitions.
WARNING: A massive Dread Guard deployment has been mobilized to retrieve the device. A full-size strike team is recommended before attempting to engage.

SECTION X TACTICAL UPDATE / VICTORY CONFIRMATION
The Aurora Cannon has been disabled--a crushing defeat for the Dread Masters and their cowardly servants.
Patrol teams will be dispatched to eliminate any remaining enemy forces within Section X. Glory to the Empire!
